thread.title_full: Sunshine Pillows and Sunny Bay Heating Pads by BioMed DB Design, LLC reviewed by song chen

author: song chen
title: song chen
text:
for neck,
The fabric is soft with soothing feeling. But they're too heavy and the curvy surface of tight wrap decrease the contact surface. Also for me I really don't see the benefit of extra long in length.
